title: mellytinker
author: mellytinker
content: i have a poker way to make money i will show u it fully if we can work together, not alot of money is needed , why i need money? because i was in debt im making but small amounts we can scal this up i would be fully transparent lets make this money if ure interested send me your discord

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: You are in debt, you need money, you need someone to fund you to play poker. You have a poor mindset towards gambling if you are thinking like that.I will advice you to look elsewhere if you want to pay your debt, gambling will only give you more chance to have more debt. Hope not gambling is the cause of your dept is what I am thinking about.No one would be foolish...

comments.author: janggernaut
comments.body: Quote from: mellytinker on December 24, 2022, 05:51:21 AMi have a poker way to make money i will show u it fully if we can work together, not alot of money is needed , why i need money? because i was in debt im making but small amounts we can scal this up i would be fully transparent lets make this money if ure interested send me your discordYou could add more debt with that while trying to pay your old debt with new debt from people. You never know until when you lose in poker. (If you are expert on poker, you shouldn't in debt on first place)

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: mellytinker on December 24, 2022, 05:51:21 AMi have a poker way to make money i will show u it fully if we can work together, not alot of money is needed , why i need money? because i was in debt im making but small amounts we can scal this up i would be fully transparent lets make this money if ure interested send me your discord   - In short, you are an expert in the game of poker. And you want to use your expertise in this game if someone will fund you in betting, right? in other words, you rent out your poker skills depending on the percentage you can agree on with an investor who will fund you.That's why you got into debt? Did you get into debt from the poker you played here? and you didn't recover your loss here first? I think you will have a hard time finding someone to fund you here on this forum, believe me.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: mellytinker on December 24, 2022, 05:51:21 AMi have a poker way to make money If you can make money from poker the first people that you will ask for money to fund you are your relatives and friends but you can't ask for help because you cannot fool them so you go here to ask for help because people here don't know who you are.Quotei will show u it fully if we can work together, not alot of money is needed , why i need money? because i was in debt im making but small amounts we can scal,I bet you are in debt because you are a chronic gambler and you go here trying to scam people and sustain your addiction.Quote this up i would be fully transparent lets make this money if ure interested send me your discordNo one will sustain a loser and chronic gambler ask for professional help and take a break from gambling you really need that.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Mr. Magkaisa on December 24, 2022, 06:42:15 AMThat's why you got into debt? Did you get into debt from the poker you played here? and you didn't recover your loss here first? I think you will have a hard time finding someone to fund you here on this forum, believe me.I believe it is clear to many posters of this gambling board if how addicted I was to gambling until I left gambling for over a year, started it again and stopped it until I was able to have control over it. What OP is experiencing has been what I have experienced before, it is not new to me again. I remember I wanted to borrow large amount of money from a cousing, I was happy today because he did not borrowed me, I was angry at the time, thinking he can borrow me and use it to gamble. I borrowed from my brother a huge amount, used it to gamble and I lost it. I sold my home theater and I used it to gamble. I even sold my laptop and used it to gamble. I borrow from people and I was in dept, I used the money I supposed to use for other things to gamble. Some of my father's money that was with me was lost into gambling that I was unable to repay him, if I am not his child, maybe I would be in jail by now. I hope his family will know that he is gambling, his family taking action will help him because he is definitely an addict, I can smell he is an addict.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Quote from: mellytinker on December 24, 2022, 05:51:21 AM....why i need money? because i was in debt im making but small amounts we can scal this upIs your debt too big that you sound desperate and greedy? You should be alright if you're confident that your poker style of play is earning you some profit. You could save those "small amounts" and roll it over so you could scale up. There's no need to risk other people's money.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Quote from: mellytinker on December 24, 2022, 05:51:21 AMi have a poker way to make money i will show u it fully if we can work together, not alot of money is needed , why i need money? because i was in debt im making but small amounts we can scal this up i would be fully transparent lets make this money if ure interested send me your discordWhy don't you did this when you're not yet in debt? For newbies who may fall in this trap, a bid good luck before you get drained in debt too. It's not a new scheme from scammers trying to lure you that they can work for your money, it will double or you have nothing to do but wait. Too good to be true.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: it's really hard trust a newbie with a request like this. just because there is no track record, no proofs, and if you are already with debts it means that something isn't working in your strategy, scaling is not really easy... if the amount is not to big, start to request a loan from your parent/family/local bank....moreover you need to clarify what amount you think is the minimum for a strategy like this, how did you think to recover from debt, how did you think to pay this partner... I don't know if an escrow could be used for that kind of transaction, but it would make really transparent your activity.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Card games and all other casino games were created by individuals who considered all possible scenarios when they made them. That also involves cheating or partnering up with someone in order to cheat. In other words, if there was a foolproof system to always win and beat the house, that particular game would be quickly banned or have its rules changed so the house wins long-term. You might have some tricks to increase your chances of winning, but nothing significant.   Poker is somewhat different because you are playing against other players and not against the house, but there are systems in place to detect cheating patterns.

comments.author: klidex
comments.body: Quote from: Mr. Magkaisa on December 24, 2022, 06:42:15 AMQuote from: mellytinker on December 24, 2022, 05:51:21 AMi have a poker way to make money i will show u it fully if we can work together, not alot of money is needed , why i need money? because i was in debt im making but small amounts we can scal this up i would be fully transparent lets make this money if ure interested send me your discord   - In short, you are an expert in the game of poker. And you want to use your expertise in this game if someone will fund you in betting, right? in other words, you rent out your poker skills depending on the percentage you can agree on with an investor who will fund you.That's why you got into debt? Did you get into debt from the poker you played here? and you didn't recover your loss here first? I think you will have a hard time finding someone to fund you here on this forum, believe me.Yes, that's right, I think if OP was a poker game expert he would be more than happy to use his own money to bet in poker games.That way when he experiences a win the money is entirely his own without having to share it with other people.What's more, it is indeed difficult to trust people who offer cooperation to lend a certain amount of money to bet in a gambling game.I personally, if I have money, instead of entrusting it to lend it to others as betting capital, I better use it myself to bet in a game that I like and understand, even though it's not necessarily a win, but it has more of a sense of satisfaction in itself.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: Quote from: mellytinker on December 24, 2022, 05:51:21 AMi have a poker way to make money i will show u it fully if we can work together, not alot of money is needed , why i need money? because i was in debt im making but small amounts we can scal this up i would be fully transparent lets make this money if ure interested send me your discordDon't you have friends around you who have the money you need and you play together? It will be safer than you looking for someone from the internet that you don't know at all unless you have some intention of him.I don't mean to be suspicious, but hearing you say you have a powerful way to make money, you are in debt, and you need money is a very attractive temptation.Unless you know some of the people on this forum and at least you've spoken to them personally, even if you're not very close to them.

comments.author: drwhobox
comments.body: If you are fully transparent and your way of playing poker can make you win, you should've gone for your close ones for partnership. Making 500-1000 usd daily is a big amount for any person, why don't you get more money from the bank and pay them all after a week or two.No one here will fall for it, and your approach must be more convincing and unique.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Quote from: michellee on December 24, 2022, 09:16:54 AMDon't you have friends around you who have the money you need and you play together? No one around believed that I could make $1k to 1.5k daily if they saw I was in a lot of debt. They would conclude that I had a gambling problem if I was open enough about my habits.Also, since this request is on a "work together" basis, OP can let you play alone. but someone who doesn't understand how to play poker can be trikced, OP can be someone else as an opponent. Too much of a trap here.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: Quote from: mellytinker on December 24, 2022, 05:51:21 AMi have a poker way to make money i will show u it fully if we can work together, not alot of money is needed , why i need money? because i was in debt im making but small amounts we can scal this up i would be fully transparent lets make this money if ure interested send me your discordas a poker player i feel fooled by this thread, lolif you really have skills in playing poker and making money why don't you just borrow money from the bank and increase your debt even more there instead of asking someone from this forum to fund you

comments.author: famososMuertos
comments.body: This guy is nothing more than a Troll, there is nothing more stupid than someone coming to a forum and wanting, as they say in these parts, to "peel" another user, in fact, if he is so stupid to have this proposal, he can leave " peeled/ripped off" is the OP.In any case, I have been commenting on it, another post*  of the "innocuous" type for the OP's own objective in his conjecture, but free publicity to understand the grace of these useless topics in the OP's context, for the simple fact of creating discussion extended.So, this Topic (one more) to understand and remember where you should not go if you dedicate make bets for entertainment or you want to be a frequent player.

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.body: If you only need small amount money, you can gamble on casino that offer faucet and try it until you met the minimum requirement.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: If you are in debt and you need money to pay your debt. I don't know if your story is legit. But I will tell you that there are different way you can pay off your debt. If the owner of the debt is pressurizing you, then you can sell somethings in your house to settle the debt. Or you can also do daily jobs to pay the debt instead of looking for someone to funds poker wallet to play poker to pay your debt. Do you know that gambling is by luck not by your professionalism. Now if you lost the money in the process of playing the poker, what will you do? OP, you can use another means to settle the debt.

comments.author: hopenotlate
comments.body: Quote from: mellytinker on December 24, 2022, 05:51:21 AMi have a poker way to make money i will show u it fully if we can work together, not alot of money is needed , why i need money? because i was in debt im making but small amounts we can scal this up i would be fully transparent lets make this money if ure interested send me your discordIf you are that good in poker you can easily start by playing microstakes and freerolls, that basically all poker sites offer, and build you bankroll up....btw when you will get rich this way don't forget to share some money with me who showed you how to do

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: mellytinker on December 24, 2022, 05:51:21 AMi have a poker way to make money i will show u it fully if we can work together, not alot of money is needed , why i need money? because i was in debt im making but small amounts we can scal this up i would be fully transparent lets make this money if ure interested send me your discordGet a loan if you really just need a capital to your poker game since you have a working strategy. Why need a partnership that other party will just need to share you funds for your bank roll. A gambler with debt is considered as problematic when it comes to partnership. No one in the right mind here that can do this offer considering how messy is your background.You said that you are earning small then why just keep continue on this phase until you save huge funds for your bankroll?
